short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Search directly Stackoverflow (includes all the supported language versions) right on the browser toolbar or just by right-clicking.
short.ja,pt_BR,pt_PT,ru: Search directly Stackoverflow (includes all the supported language versions) by the extension's popup on the browser toolbar

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
There are two ways to search:
- Just right-click on the selected text and choose "Stackoverflow...".
- Click on the extension's icon to show the Stackoverflow popup and search there (you should pin the extension's icon on the browser toolbar right after installing).
After that, the result will be shown on a new tab.
